name: Bitcorati
tag_list: bitcoin, bitcoins, money, currency, finance, e-commerce, news, directory, blog
overview:
Bitcorati.com aims to be the world’s most trusted and used Bitcoin director, most popular review engine and industry standard rating system for people and businesses involved in Bitcoins.

The Bitcorati directory will use its own proprietary algorithm, weighting user profile and business listing data, site ratings, search and social metrics to rank the top individuals and businesses involved in Bitcoin.

A ranking algorithm will be used to compile and publish industry standard lists for both individuals (The Bitcorati 500) and for businesses (The Bitcoin 500). These lists will update daily on Bitcorati.com and be promoted on a monthly basis through multiple marketing channels and syndicates.

The name “Bitcorati”, a hybrid of the words “Bitcoin” and “literati” are casually used terms used to define the knowledgeable and progressive people, early adopters, miners, developers, businesses, and merchants supporting the Bitcoin protocol and Bitcoin economy, and who continue to believe in its potential as a currency, payment network, and storage of value.

Are you a part of the bitcorati? Join today!
